articles.title: Garrett Foster death: Texas governor says he will pardon Daniel Perry - Austin American-Statesman
articles.description: Abbott's pardon tweet published less than 24 hours after Tucker Carlson called out the governor on his broadcast to say that Texas did not recognize the right of self-defense.
articles.content: Less than 24 hours after a jury in Austin convicted him of murder in the shooting of a protester, Gov. Greg Abbott announced on social media Saturday that he will pardon Army Sgt. Daniel Perry as soo… [+1240 chars]

articles.content:
